alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Allen; Evangeline; Jefferson Davis; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 10:44PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jefferson Davis, southern Evangeline, northern Acadia, southwestern St. Landry and southeastern Allen Parishes through 1115 PM CST... At 1043 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Elton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eunice, Church Point, Mamou, Kinder, Basile, Oberlin, Iota, Elton, Chataignier, Mowata, Prairie Ronde, Savoy, Duralde, Lawtell, Swords, Branch, Richard and Hathaway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Acadia; Allen; Evangeline; Jefferson Davis; St. Landry
